contents.text: Welcome to Kapwing, your San Francisco-based editor for videos, GIFs, and images.
For help with media editing tools and creative features, press 1.
To explore our free meme maker and templates, press 1.
Please hold while we connect you to our creative support team.

navigationGoals: Quickly generate a branded meme using Kapwing’s templates
I need help creating a short meme-based video tribute to share with fellow veterans.
I want to create a custom meme using Kapwing’s template library and add dynamic text overlays.
I need help using the meme maker templates to create a birthday greeting.
I want to use the meme maker to create a physics-themed meme for my study group presentation.

contents.text: For assistance with subtitles, resizing, and filters, press 2.
Please hold while we connect you to a tools specialist.

navigationGoals: Add subtitles and resize a video for social media posting
I want to add subtitles and apply filters to my military training footage.
I need to auto-generate SRT subtitles and batch-convert my video to a 1:1 aspect ratio with a vintage filter.
Can you guide me through adding subtitles and cropping my home video?
I need help adding subtitles, resizing, and applying filters to my recorded lab demonstration video.

contents.text: For account management and billing options, press 2.
To upgrade your plan or manage your subscription, press 1.
Please hold while we connect you to a subscription specialist.

navigationGoals: Upgrade my account to a Pro plan with team access
I’d like to upgrade my account to access advanced editing features for my veteran support projects.
I’d like to upgrade to the Team plan to enable watermark-free exports and API access for collaborative editing.
I’d like to upgrade my account to remove the watermark and set up a paid plan.
I’d like to upgrade my subscription so I can export longer videos for my semester project.

contents.text: For payment issues or invoice questions, press 2.
Please hold while we connect you to our billing department.

navigationGoals: Fix a failed payment on my recent invoice
I need to resolve a payment error on my latest Kapwing invoice.
My last payment failed; I need to update my credit card and retrieve the invoice for this month’s billing.
My last payment didn’t go through—help me update my card and check the invoice.
I have a question about the invoice I received and need help with my last payment.
